Description: Apollo Fertility stands as one of the most reputable choices for fertility treatment in India. Renowned for its advanced facilities, it provides cutting-edge interventions in the field. The protocols at Apollo Fertility are meticulously crafted to tackle both male and female fertility concerns, integrating clinical, surgical, and psychological approaches.A multidisciplinary team comprising experts in Fertility, Reproductive Medicine, Reproductive Endocrinology, Embryology, Andrology, fertility-optimizing Laparoscopic surgeons, and dedicated counsellors work with couples to help achieve their dream of parenthood.

Neelkanth Hospital stands as a leading IVF and gynaecology centre with locations in Gurgaon, Delhi, and Patna. Dr. Bindu Garg, the Medical Director, spearheads the IVF center in Gurgaon, delivering specialized services to enhance the well-being of the patient community.As a highly reputable and relied-upon gynaecology and IVF centre, the hospital boasts state-of-the-art technologies and a team of exceptionally experienced experts. The team has consistently delivered superior and precise fertility treatments. The hospital's primary focus is on the overall health and well-being of every patient, ensuring a secure and nurturing environment, prioritizing the care and comfort of patients served.

Rainbow Hospital, India's first corporate children's hospital, opened on November 14, 1999.Hyderabad, Telangana, Banglore, Vijayawada, and New Delhi are among the 12 places where the Rainbow group has established its hospitals.It was also the first private children's hospital in India to be accredited by the NABH. For the past 19 years, the hospital has performed 9000 deliveries per year. In addition, the hospital treats roughly 1800 premature newborns each year.In 2018, it was named the best fertility hospital in South India. The IVF treatment unit has had the highest success rate in the country so far.On an yearly basis, the team treats roughly 30,000 patients. Every year, the surgeons perform about 2500 procedures, with 75 percent of them being performed laparoscopically.

HospitalName: Nova IVF- Vashi, Andheri & Chembur, Mumbai
Description: Nova IVF Fertility (NIF) is a fertility clinic that offers the most modern and cutting-edge fertility treatments. Over the last eight years, they have grown to over 40 centers, achieving over 40,000 pregnancies.NIF offers three fertility clinics in Mumbai, one in Andheri, the other in Chembur, and the third in Vashi. All of these Nova IVF clinics provide the highest level of reproductive healthcare treatment, which is supported by a team of renowned IVF doctors, gynecologists, embryologists, staff, and other technicians, all of which have extensive experience in this field.The team stays up to speed on the newest clinical expertise to ensure the most effective male and female infertility therapy. Not to mention, the clinic is outfitted with cutting-edge technology, making Nova one of the top IVF clinics in the world.

HospitalName: Apollo Cradle Maternity & Children's Hospital, Jubilee Hills, Hyderabad
Description: Apollo Cradle Maternity & Children's Hospital Jubilee Hills is known as a Centre of Excellence in Women's and Children's care. It is a member of the Apollo Group of Hospitals, which strives to make high-quality, international healthcare accessible to everyone.Gynecology and Obstetrics, Maternity, Pediatrics, Neonatology, Fetal Medicine, High-risk Pregnancy, and Fertility are among the hospital's specialties. This Hospital embodies its three core concepts, namely clinical quality, personalized care, and state-of-the-art infrastructure, with attractively designed furnishings and a welcoming ambiance.

The Cloud Nine Hospital specializes in IVF, Gynecology and Pediatrics. The clinic has 2 branches in Mumbai- Malad & Vashi. The hospital started its services in 2015 in Malad as a fertility hospital with an emphasis on assisting patients throughout the full pregnancy process, from conception to delivery and child care.Other than Assisted Reproductive Technology (ART), the hospital provides services in gynecology, pediatrics, physiotherapy, nutrition and dietetics, stem cell banking, acute care, cosmetology, neonatal care, breastfeeding assistance, and other related services.Video consultation, home vaccination, sample collection from home, home delivery of medications, online consultation, flu shots at home, and online consultation for breastfeeding and mental health are among the additional options available. It is a leading supplier of prenatal physical therapy.

HospitalName: Apollo Cradle Royale, Nehru Place, Delhi
Description: Apollo Cradle Royale in Delhi excels in Gynaecology, Maternity, Paediatrics, Paediatric Surgery, and Neonatology, serving as a centre of excellence in these specialized healthcare areas.Spanning an expansive 35,000 square feet, Apollo Cradle is a premium healthcare facility that provides a wide range of services. The hospital offers procedures such as IVF, IUI, fertilization, IVF-ET, IUD placement, laparoscopic sterilization, complex pregnancy treatment, gynecological endoscopy/laparoscopy, abdominal hysterectomy, clitoral hood reduction, and hysterectomy (both abdominal and vaginal).Apollo Cradle boasts an advanced level III Neonatal Intensive Care Unit (NICU) that offers top-notch care. Additionally, for women requiring emergency care, there is an additional Intensive Care Unit (ICU).

Indira IVF Hospital in Mumbai is a pioneer in providing affordable and reputable infertility treatment to people from all walks of life. The single-specialty hospital in Mumbai, which opened in 2017, is descended from its parent hospital in Udaipur, which opened in 1988 with only two rooms.Because of the employment of innovative medical technologies, sophisticated medical infrastructure, and individualized care from medical workers and specialists, the hospital has a reputation for successful IVF stories over the previous 5+ years.

Since its inception in 2011, the Nova IVI Fertility Centre in Sadashivanagar has assisted thousands of couples in their quest to become parents. Koramangala, Sadashivanagar, and Kammanahalli are the three locations in Bangalore where the centres are located. The clinic has the proper combination of technology and expertise to provide the finest treatment possible in compliance with international standards.

ART Fertility Clinics, Gurgaon, has already established itself as a premier single-specialty facility for assisted reproductive technology since its inception in 2021.The hospital is operated by ESHRE-certified fertility doctors and adheres to WHO guidelines.Treatments such as IVF, ICSI, IUI, PGT-A/PGT-SR, PGT-M, semen analysis, and laparoscopy are available at ART Fertility Clinics in Gurugram. In addition, male infertility tests such as FNA, TESE, and Micro TESE are also carried out.The clinical staff at ART Fertility Clinics in Delhi is knowledgeable and skilled, having received training from prestigious medical and human reproduction programs. The ART Fertility Clinics provide individualized treatment regimens and employ sensitive and caring nurses and counselors. The hospital's facilities and layout are developed with patient safety in mind. It is large, clean, and sanitary.

HospitalName: Advance Fertility & Gynecology Centre, New Delhi
Description: Advance Fertility and Gynecology Centre is India's Best IVF Centre, offering the best IVF services as well as an exceptional Assisted Reproduction Center in Delhi NCR. The team of Fertility Experts with professional qualifications and experience, led by internationally acknowledged Infertility Expert Dr. Kaberi Banerjee, guarantees success at a fraction of the cost of equivalent procedures overseas.Even in challenging instances or those with previous failures, Advance Fertility Centre offers a state-of-the-art embryology laboratory with all of the latest equipment essential for the greatest results. In Vitro Fertilization, Intracytoplasmic Sperm Injection, Blastocyst Culture, Assisted Hatching, Pre-implantation Screening and Diagnosis, and other significant procedures are carried out in the laboratory.

In 2015, IVI RMA Global launched ART Fertility Clinics in the Middle East under the brand name IVI Middle East. IVI RMA sold its ownership to Gulf Capital in January 2020, and the company was renamed ART Fertility Clinics.Mr. Suresh Soni, Chief Executive Officer, and Prof. Dr. Human Fatemi, Group Medical Director, have led ART Fertility Clinics since its establishment (MD, Ph.D. at the University of Brussels, Belgium).In the last six years, ART Fertility Clinics has grown to become the top institute for Human Reproductive Medicine in the Middle East, with clinics in Abu Dhabi, Muscat, and Dubai.

Southend Fertility and IVF is now Nova IVF Fertility.It offers a complete Infertility Management program to couples who are experiencing difficulty having a child. The facility has been a centre of expertise for couples seeking fertility therapy in Delhi for over 20 years.The clinic has also taught thousands of gynecologists who now work as fertility specialists. The clinic claims complete treatment openness, sympathetic staff, a vibrant environment, and hopeful outcomes. Patients who return to the clinic after failed cycles demonstrate their trust in and satisfaction with their treatment method.

ART Fertility Clinics in Hyderabad is one of the most sought-after single-specialty fertility hospitals in the city. The hospital opened in April 2021, and it is one of 18 similar hospitals that the ART Fertility plans to open in prominent Indian cities. It is the world's leading healthcare center for reproductive medicine and genetics, as well as the only medical body that undertakes localized research and development aimed at determining the root cause of infertility.

Nova IVF Fertility Chennai is part of India's largest chain of fertility and IVF clinics. The facility provides the most up-to-date infertility treatments and techniques while overlooking the scenic splendor of the seaside. The centre also provides pre-genetic counseling and treatments in addition to basic and advanced reproductive treatment.
